it.polimi.se2019.limperio.nicotera.italia.controller

Class WeaponController

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.limperio.nicotera.italia.controller.WeaponController

  • public class WeaponController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller used to check the usability of weapons. Collaborates with Shoot controller to guide the player in his shoot action.
    Author:
    Giuseppe Italia

    • Method Detail

      • getUsableEffectsForThisWeapon

        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getUsableEffectsForThisWeapon(WeaponCard weaponCard)
        Gets, for each weapon passed by parameter, an array list containing the numbers of the effect usable by a weapon. The control happens checking if the effect is affordable, usable for the position of the owner in the moment that is called and for the previous choices of the player. 1 is for the basic effect or basic mode. 2 is for the first extra effect. 3 is for the second extra effect. 4 is for the alternative mode
        Parameters:
        weaponCard - Weapon card to check which effects has usable.
        Returns:
        Array list with the number relative to the effects usable by the weapon passed by parameter.

      • getPlayersCouldBeAttackedFromBasicEffectOfTractorBeam

        java.util.ArrayList<Player> getPlayersCouldBeAttackedFromBasicEffectOfTractorBeam(WeaponCard weaponCard)
        Gets the list of players that could be attacked from the basic effect of tractor beam.
        Parameters:
        weaponCard - The weapon card that is involved in the choice of the effect.
        Returns:
        Array list of players could be attacked from basic effect of tractor beam

      • getSquareCouldBeSelectedForTractorBeam

        java.util.ArrayList<Square> getSquareCouldBeSelectedForTractorBeam(WeaponCard weaponCard,
                                                                   Player player)
        Gets an array list with the squares that could be selected to use correctly the effects of tractor beam.
        Parameters:
        weaponCard - Weapon card involved in the check.
        player - Owner of the weapon card.
        Returns:
        Array list with the squares of the map selectable to use the effect of tractor beam.

      • isThisWeaponUsable

        boolean isThisWeaponUsable(WeaponCard weaponCard,
                           int movementCanDoBeforeReloadAndShoot)
        Checks if a weapon is usable. To do this checks if there is at least one effect usable. This control is made by to enable the button shoot on the GUI in the right moment, when the player could really shoot.
        Parameters:
        weaponCard - Weapon card to check if has at least one effect usable.
        movementCanDoBeforeReloadAndShoot - Movement that player could do before to shoot because has more than six damage or becuase the game is in frenzy mode.
        Returns:
        True if the weapon passed by parameter is usable, false otherwise.

      • effectAlreadyChosen

        private boolean effectAlreadyChosen(int numOfEffect)
        Checks if an effect has been already chosen during the shoot action.
        Parameters:
        numOfEffect - Number of the effect that the methods has to check if it has been already chosen.
        Returns:
        True if the effect passed by parameter has been already chosen, false otherwise.

      • getPlayersInMySquare

        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getPlayersInMySquare(int movement,
                                                           Square square)
        Gets the list of nicknames of players in the square passed by parameter.
        Parameters:
        movement - Movement that the player owner of the weapon card could do before to choose a player or more than a player among them contained in the list.
        square - Square where check the players contained on it.
        Returns:
        Array list of nicknames of the player in the square passed by parameter.

      • getPlayersOnlyInAdjSquares

        java.util.ArrayList<Player> getPlayersOnlyInAdjSquares(int movement,
                                                       Square squareOfPlayer)
        Gets the list of players on the squares of the adjacency of the squareOfPlayer passed by parameter.
        Parameters:
        movement - Possibly movements to do before to check the player in the adjacency.
        squareOfPlayer - Square of the player that is interested to know who there are on the adjacency
        Returns:
        Array list of players on the adjacent squares of the squareOfPlayer.

      • getSquaresOfVisibleRoom

        java.util.ArrayList<Square> getSquaresOfVisibleRoom(int movement,
                                                    Square squareOfPlayer,
                                                    int distanceNeeded,
                                                    boolean differentFromMine)
        Gets the squares of visible room for a player that is on squareOfPlayer.
        Parameters:
        movement - Possibly movements that a player could do before to check which squares are visible.
        squareOfPlayer - Reference square.
        distanceNeeded - distance within which consider the squares.
        differentFromMine - It's true when the squares of the room of squareOfPlayer has to be not considered, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        Array list of the square of visible rooms.

      • removeSquareCloserThan

        private void removeSquareCloserThan(Square startingSquare,
                                    java.util.ArrayList<Square> listOfSquareFromWhereRemoveSquares,
                                    int distanceNeeded)
        Removes from a list of squares the squares closer thant distanceNeeded with the reference of startingSquare.
        Parameters:
        startingSquare - The square of reference from that calculate the distance.
        listOfSquareFromWhereRemoveSquares - List of square from where remove squares.
        distanceNeeded - Distance within which to consider the squares

        listOfSquares - List of squares from where remove squares without players.

      • squaresUsefulForFlamethrower

        private java.util.ArrayList<Square> squaresUsefulForFlamethrower(int movementCanDoBeforeReloadAndShoot,
                                                                 Square squareOfPlayer)
        Gets the squares useful to use the effects of flamethrower.
        Parameters:
        movementCanDoBeforeReloadAndShoot - Possibly movements that the player has to use flamethrower could do before to use the weapon.
        squareOfPlayer - Square of reference from where checks with squares are available to be added to the list.
        Returns:
        Array list of squares useful to use effect of flamethrower.

      • getVisiblePlayers

        java.util.ArrayList<Player> getVisiblePlayers(int movement,
                                              Player playerCanSee,
                                              int distanceNeeded)
        Gets the list of players visible by the player passed by parameter.
        Parameters:
        movement - Possibly movement that the player passed by parameter could do before to check which player can see.
        playerCanSee - Player interested to know which players is able to see.
        distanceNeeded - Distance within which to consider the squares.
        Returns:
        Array list of players visible by the player passed by parameter.

      • getPlayersInCardinalDirections

        java.util.ArrayList<Player> getPlayersInCardinalDirections(int movement,
                                                           Square square,
                                                           boolean ignoreWalls)
        Gets the list of players positioned in squares on cardinal directions respect to the square passed by parameter.
        Parameters:
        movement - Possibly movements could be done before to check the players available to be added to the list.
        square - Square of reference from where cehck the players available to be added to the list.
        Returns:
        List of players positioned in squares on cardinal directions respect to the square passed by parameter.

      • addSquaresForCardinalDirections

        void addSquaresForCardinalDirections(Square startingSquare,
                                     java.util.ArrayList<Square> squaresAvailable,
                                     int limitOfDistance,
                                     boolean ignoreWalls)
        Adds to a list of squares all of the squares on the cardinal directions respect the startinSquare passed by parameter.
        Parameters:
        startingSquare - Square from where checks squares on its cardinal directions.
        squaresAvailable - List of squares where add the square on cardinal directions respect squaresAvailable.
        limitOfDistance - Distance within which to consider the squares.
        ignoreWalls - It's true if in the research of square is possible ignore walls, false otherwise.

      • getPlayersNotVisible

        java.util.ArrayList<Player> getPlayersNotVisible(int movement,
                                                 Player playerCanSee)
        Gets players not visible by the player passed by parameter.
        Parameters:
        movement - Movement that playerCanSee could do before the research of players not visible.
        playerCanSee - Player interested to know the players for him not visible.
        Returns:
        Array list of players not visible by playerCanSee.

      • effectAffordable

        private boolean effectAffordable(Player player,
                                 ColorOfCard_Ammo[] price)
        Checks if an effect is affordable by a player passed by parameter.
        Parameters:
        player - Player that wants to use the effect involved.
        price - The price to pay for the effect.
        Returns:
        True if the effect is affordable, false otherwise.

      • getSquareForAlternativeModeOfPowerGloveAndFlamethrower

        Square getSquareForAlternativeModeOfPowerGloveAndFlamethrower(Square squareOfAttacker,
                                                              Square squareOfFirstAttacked)
        Gets the square useful to use alternative mode for Power glove and Flamethrower.
        Parameters:
        squareOfAttacker - Square where there is the attacker.
        squareOfFirstAttacked - Square where there is the first player attacked during the shoot action.
        Returns:
        Square usable for the alternative mode of power glove and flamethrower.

      • getPlayersForAlternativeModeOfRailgun

        java.util.ArrayList<Player> getPlayersForAlternativeModeOfRailgun(Square squareOfAttacker,
                                                                  Square squareOfFirstAttacked)
        Gets the list of players selectable to use the alternative mode of railgun.
        Parameters:
        squareOfAttacker - Square of the attacker player.
        squareOfFirstAttacked - Square of the first player attacked during the shoot action.
        Returns:
        The list of the players that could be attacked by the alternative mode of railgun.

      • getSquaresForVortexCannon

        java.util.ArrayList<Square> getSquaresForVortexCannon(Square squareOfPlayer)
        Gets the square useful for the effect of vortex cannon.
        Parameters:
        squareOfPlayer - Square of the player that wants to open the vortex cannon.
        Returns:
        Array list of the squares available to open a vortex on it.
